HediffDef.label: lovin' dependency
HediffDef.description: This person has a genetically-induced biochemical dependency on lovin'. They will need to partake in lovin’ on a regular basis to be content. After 5 days without lovin’, carriers will suffer from lovin’ deficiency. After 30 days without lovin’, they may abandon the colony.\n\nTakes effect after age: 16.
